## Natural history notes

The southern green-striped grasshopper (Chortophaga australior) can be found in a range of colors from bright green to brown with patterning. This species can be found where soil is bare or the grond is distrubed (for example, from frequent mowing). Listen closely for crackling or buzzing sounds when this insect takes flight. This grasshopper is common and can be found throughout Florida.
